alert.note: Alert for Lunenburg (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 7:27PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Lunenburg County through 815 PM EDT... At 726 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Keysville, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rain could result in ponding of water on roadways in low lying and poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Lunenburg, Rehoboth, Kells Corner, Wilburn, Loves Mill, Arvins Store, Nutbush, Plantersville, Blevins Corner, Pleasant Grove, Meherrin, Fort Mitchell and Simplicity. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
